articles.title: JD Vance formally picked as Trump's vice-presidential nominee - BBC.com
articles.description: Mr Vance, 39, is a former "never Trump" Republican, venture capitalist and author of the memoir Hillbilly Elegy.
articles.content:
By Graeme Baker, BBC News, Washington
Donald Trump has named former "never Trumper" Republican and Ohio Senator JD Vance as his vice-presidential nominee.
